settings.heading_large: Driving Excellence in Every Aspect: Meet Our Global Leadership Team
Superior Quality, Innovation and Customer Service Since 1949
settings.content:
Founded in 1949, the success of The Paquin Company is best reflected by the quality of the products that we represent and our hard earned reputation for integrity and good customer service, both of which are a testament to the quality of our team. We have maintained a leadership position by attracting, and retaining only the most talented and qualified individuals with the technical know-how, education, and personal skills necessary to support our customers.

At our core, we are a hybrid distribution organization, focusing on hydraulics, pneumatics, and electrical control systems. We carry an extensive inventory for the lines we represent, with special focus on existing customer requirements. However, we are much more than your typical distributor.

Paquin associates are highly valued contributors to this process, and our organization. Our work environment encourages creativity and communication. Internally, we are always moving toward continuous improvement in customer service, products, and processes. This improves Paquin’s ability to respond to our customers changing needs.

Paquin’s mission is to maintain and expand our reputation for integrity, innovation, quality, and superior customer service.

settings.heading: The Right Part For Every Engineering Project
settings.content: From simple mechancial to sophistacted solid state designs, Paquin has you covered.

settings.heading: Designing with Precision
settings.content: Our initial phase involves transforming client ideas into detailed designs with cutting-edge software and teamwork, ensuring specifications and innovations are perfectly matched. This careful planning lays the groundwork for success.

settings.heading: Materials Matter
settings.content: At this stage, we select optimal materials for durability, functionality, and sustainability. Our choices are informed by industry insights and research, aiming to meet project requirements and environmental goals effectively.

settings.heading: Manufacturing Innovation
settings.content: Entering the manufacturing phase, our facilities and craftsmen use precision engineering to actualize designs. We blend efficiency, accuracy, and innovative techniques to produce high-quality, industry-leading results.

settings.heading: Testing and Quality Control
settings.content: In our final step, every product undergoes extensive testing and quality control to meet our standards for functionality and durability. This ensures our products are ready for their intended use, surpassing customer expectations.

settings.heading_large: A Manufacturing Process Which Sets the Standard for Excellence
Join Our Team and Help Shape the Future of Engineering
settings.content: Join our team and be part of an innovative engineering journey. At Paquin, we value creativity, precision, and a passion for problem-solving, offering roles that challenge and advance your career in a dynamic environment.
